long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Human Accomplishment celebrates and centers the world's most accomplished people. We call out several individuals each day who have made unique and innovative contributions to humanity. Important, historic people from the fields of Art, Science, Music and Literature are featured.

Use our browser extension to be inspired by today's featured people with just a click from any web page.
